original_text: It is not good to accept the person of the wicked, to overthrow the righteous in judgment.
korean_text: 악인을 두둔하는 것과 재판할 때에 의인을 억울하게 하는 것이 선하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: It is not good to accept the person of the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 악인의 편을 드는 것은 좋지 않다

sentences.original_text: to overthrow the righteous in judgment
